title: The Last Leg: Locked Down Under
overview: The Last Leg: Locked Down Under will attempt a TV first, a live comedy show with three hosts in three different locations at the same time! The show will take viewers on a global tour from Melbourne, to London and finally Huddersfield, as hosts Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker present from their respective homes to offer their unmatched satirical insight to current world events. In each episode, Adam, Josh and Alex will be joined by special guests, and as always, the audience at home will be encouraged to get involved using their Twitter hashtag #isitok.
